properties.name: BSSID
properties.description: MAC Address of the access point

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: The primary 20 MHz frequency (in MHz) of the channel over which the client is communicating with the access point.

properties.name: level
properties.description: The detected signal level in dBm, also known as the RSSI.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Timestamp in microseconds (since boot) when this result was last seen.

properties.name: capabilities
properties.description: Describes the authentication, key management, and encryption schemes supported by the access point.
